content: we had such a great response to the wanderers relaxed fit crochet cardigan and so much fun crocheting it it s so cozy and easy to wear and we reach for it all the time it s simple enough to be one of our everyday basics but we also love the bobbled texture we placed on the sleeves we get comments on it all the time and we love how its both a little bit unique and a little bit classic so even in the early stages of this design we knew we were going to create a sister pattern in a sweater version **please note this is a made to measure pattern it is not a graded sized pattern this means it will fit to your measurements perfectly is very customizable and flexible on gauge however made to measure patterns are written slightly differently to graded sized patterns the wanderers relaxed fit crochet v neck sweater is an oversized draping sweater with long sleeves and ribbing on the base and sleeves it features a simple ribbed v neckline that is gentle and not too deep the main panels are crocheted in a simple triple crochet and a half_double_crochet stitch pattern the oversized sleeves use another stitch combination of double crochets and the puff the wanderers relaxed fit crochet v neck sweater is a free and easy crochet pattern available as a size inclusive made to measure pattern it is designed and written for beginners and uses weight 4/medium/ worsted yarn this pattern can accommodate for different gauges
